constraint.description: All change sets has to specify the id attribute.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (log)-[:HAS_CHANGESET]->(set:ChangeSet) WHERE NOT HAS(set.id) RETURN log.fileName, set.author

constraint.description: All change sets has to specify the author attribute.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (log)-[:HAS_CHANGESET]->(set:ChangeSet) WHERE NOT HAS(set.author) RETURN log.fileName, set.id

constraint.description: All change sets has to specify a comment.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (log)-[:HAS_CHANGESET]->(set:ChangeSet) WHERE NOT HAS(set.comment) RETURN log.fileName, set.id, set.author

constraint.description: A change with SQL refactoring must provide a rollback element.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (log:ChangeLog)-[:HAS_CHANGESET]->(set:ChangeSet)-[:HAS_REFACTORING]->(sql:Sql) WHERE NOT ((set)-[:HAS_ROLLBACK]->(:Rollback)) RETURN log.fileName, set.id, set.author
